name: BlackFaith
description:
BlackFaith


Black_Faith. a Psychological/Survival horror/Adventure game based on local horror stories podcast

As a small indie team with no budget at all and got tons of bill to pay. Can’t help but with love and persistent for video games we eager to created Free-To-Play game called BlackFaith a story driven psychological/survival horror/adventure game based on local horror stories podcast.

The goals is to developing game while able to fully listening, exploring and crying for help from the love and support of a video game community. To gain fans and funds from peoples that interesting and has thought to talk and share with us. All this will benefits both party for the better result of development. so that way fans and devs are win win!
__
If you satisfied with this unfinished-product and interested to see it’s possible potential with much more better quality content and features such as new gameplay mechanics, new map locations, story campaigns and anything “YOU” request! With your support, any amount will keep us breathing and keep this game going and bring this vision to life. To fulfil it’s destiny, Not only will our team be able to invest more time, Also allowing us to please the beloved gaming community. We can’t made it out alive without your pure passion for video games. Thanks for playing “Black_Faith.”

“You are now the part of us, to be tester and savior! help us do this together!
Send your feedback, suggestion and your vision”

NOTE: This is kind a crazy experiment to extended the ideas concept of "what this game suppose be" by based on it’s first idea, Due to that it going to cause several things might been change in future to meet the demand.”
